article_title: Pedestrian hit, killed by semi in Cowley County
article_text:
A Winfield man has died after he was struck by a semi Sunday morning.

It happened just before 6 a.m. on Kansas Highway 360, about a mile and a half east of Highway 77. That’s on the southern edge of Winfield.

Troopers say Vance Oliver, 23, stepped in front of the semi and was hit. He was pronounced dead at the scene.

The driver of the semi was not hurt.
